reviews.content: Working with no noticeable issues on iPhone X running iOS 13.3

This tweak is absolutely stunning and far better than any other tweak of the sort.  Any other tweak that claims to even come close to this one is full of it. 100% worth the buy. And the free trial will prove me right trust me.

Amazing!!
iPhone Xs Max iOS 13.5 works!
Beautiful charge animations specially Apple animation. Love it!

Works great !
